translation.en: -Well, I expect it'll cloud over later on. -[ferryman] Aye.
translation.zh: 我想过会儿就会乌云密布

translation.en: What's going on at Sutton Hoo, then?
translation.zh: 萨顿胡那里有什么事？

translation.en: [man] There's a lady who's got an excavating job.
translation.zh: 有位女士想让我进行挖掘工作

translation.en: -Ah, thank you kindly. Mind how you go. -Thank you.
translation.zh: -多谢 小心慢走 -谢谢

translation.en: Mornin'. Mrs. Pretty, please.
translation.zh: 早安 我是来找普莱提太太的

translation.en: Basil Brown.
translation.zh: 我是巴兹尔布朗

translation.en: Wait here.
translation.zh: 在这里等一下

translation.en: -Should we take a look at them, then? -[Brown] Right.
translation.zh: -我们过去看看吧？ -好

translation.en: Things like this are usually done through museums.
translation.zh: 这种事通常是通过博物馆处理的

translation.en: [Pretty] Yes. But when I approached Ipswich,
translation.zh: 是 但当我找上伊普斯威奇博物馆时

translation.en: Mr. Reid Moir said that, with the war coming, they couldn't embark upon any new ventures.
translation.zh: 里德摩尔先生说战争即将来临 他们无法展开新的挖掘工程

translation.en: [Brown] Well, they have their hands full with a Roman villa.
translation.zh: 确实 罗马别墅的挖掘就够他们忙了

translation.en: -Yes. He said you were working on it. -[Brown] I am.
translation.zh: -是 他说那项工程是你负责的 -没错

translation.en: He told me you were a difficult man.
translation.zh: 他还说你这人不好应付

translation.en: [chuckles] Did he, now?
translation.zh: 是吗？

translation.en: Unorthodox… and untrained.
translation.zh: 反常规 而且未经过训练

translation.en: [Brown] Hmm. So that's his reference, is it?
translation.zh: 他是这样谈及我的呀？

translation.en: [chuckles] Well, I'm… I'm not untrained.
translation.zh: 我并非未经过训练

translation.en: I've been on dig since I was old enough to hold a trowel.
translation.zh: 我从会握镘刀开始就投身于挖掘工作

translation.en: [sighs] My father taught me.
translation.zh: 是我父亲教会我的

translation.en: Perhaps Reid Moir just wants to keep you for himself.
translation.zh: 也许摩尔先生 只是想把你留在身边为己所用

translation.en: -[Brown] I don't know about that. -[both chuckle]
translation.zh: 我可不这么认为

translation.en: [Brown] I've always had a curiosity to see these here mounds.
translation.zh: 我一直对这些土墩很好奇 想亲眼见识下

translation.en: -Henry VIII came here to dig. -[Pretty] So I'm told.
translation.zh: 亨利八世曾在这里挖掘过 我听说过

translation.en: [Brown] Well, no record of what he found.
translation.zh: 历史并没记载他发现了什么

translation.en: [Pretty] My husband and I bought this land, with the hope of exploring what was under there.
translation.zh: 我和我丈夫买下这块地 希望能一探究竟底下埋着些什么

translation.en: -But… Well, best-laid plans. -[Brown chuckles]
translation.zh: 不过嘛 计划赶不上变化

translation.en: [Pretty] What are they? Would you hazard a guess?
translation.zh: 让你猜的话 你觉得它们是什么？

translation.en: [Brown] Burial mounds, I expect.
translation.zh: 应该是土墩墓吧

translation.en: We're standing in someone's graveyard, I reckon.
translation.zh: 我估计 我们正站在某人的墓地里

translation.en: Viking…
translation.zh: 维京人

translation.en: or maybe older.
translation.zh: 或者更古老些

translation.en: Apparently, local girls used to lie down on them in the hope of falling pregnant.
translation.zh: 据说以前 想怀孕的当地女孩们 会过来躺在这些土墩上

translation.en: I've heard plenty of legends.
translation.zh: 民间传说我听过不少

translation.en: Is that why you want to dig, Mrs. Pretty?
translation.zh: 这就是你想挖掘的原因吗？

translation.en: Tales of buried treasure?
translation.zh: 就因为这些珍宝传说？

translation.en: My interest in archaeology began like yours, when I was scarcely old enough to hold a trowel.
translation.zh: 和你一样 我从几乎会握镘刀开始 就对考古感兴趣

translation.en: My childhood home was built on a Cistercian convent.
translation.zh: 我儿时的家 就建在一座西多会修道院上

translation.en: I helped my father excavate the apse.
translation.zh: 我协助我父亲 将其半圆形后殿挖掘了出来

translation.en: That speaks, don't it?
translation.zh: 它们会说话 对吧？

translation.en: The past.
translation.zh: 过去

translation.en: You have rabbits, Mrs. Pretty.
translation.zh: 你这里有兔子 普莱提太太

translation.en: Yes, I am aware of that. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 是 我知道

translation.en: [Brown] Rabbits burrow.
translation.zh: 兔子喜欢钻洞

translation.en: They're bad for excavations.
translation.zh: 它们不利于挖掘

translation.en: I'd like to start with this one.
translation.zh: 我想从这个开始

translation.en: [Brown] Ah, I wouldn't start with this one, Mrs. Pretty, not personally speaking.
translation.zh: 普莱提太太 就我个人而言 我不会从这个开始

translation.en: -[Pretty] Why not? -'Cause that dips in the middle, see?
translation.zh: 为什么？ 这个中间陷下去了 看到吗？

translation.en: And the soil feels-- That's compacted.
translation.zh: 而且这土壤感觉不太紧实

translation.en: Thieves used to sink shafts in.
translation.zh: 以前的盗墓贼会垂直向下挖一个竖井

translation.en: Robber's flutes, they're called.
translation.zh: 那被称为盗墓贼的长笛

translation.en: Anything they found would've been melted down and sold long ago.
translation.zh: 他们找到的珍宝 早就已经被熔化并卖掉了

translation.en: I expect you might be better off with… one of these.
translation.zh: 我认为你最好还是从那个开始

translation.en: But I have a feeling about this one.
translation.zh: 但我对这个有很好的预感

translation.en: [Brown] Well, that's your money, Mrs. Pretty, but I'd base your dig on evidence,
translation.zh: 钱是你的 普莱提太太 但我会以证据为根据

translation.en: not feeling.
translation.zh: 而不是预感

translation.en: [Pretty] As for money, would 1 pound, 15 shillings, and 6 pence a week be acceptable?
translation.zh: 至于工资 每周1英镑15先令6便士可以吗？

translation.en: -No. -[Pretty] I asked Reid Moir what he pays.
translation.zh: 不行 我问了摩尔先生 他说就付你这么多

translation.en: -That was his reply. -Well, he don't pay enough.
translation.zh: 我问了摩尔先生 他说就付你这么多 他付的根本就不够

translation.en: -[footsteps approach] -[Pretty] All right. I'm afraid that's all I can reasonably afford to spend.
translation.zh: 好吧 我恐怕只能拿出这么多钱了

translation.en: -[boy shouting] -[Brown] Right, then. Understood.
translation.zh: 好 我明白

translation.en: Robert, where did you get that gas mask? Take it off.
translation.zh: 罗伯特 你上哪弄来的防毒面具？ 脱下来

translation.en: -Sorry, I didn't realize you were-- -This is not a toy.
translation.zh: -抱歉 我不知道你在… -这不是玩具

translation.en: Robert, this is Mr. Brown.
translation.zh: 罗伯特 这是布朗先生

translation.en: -Hello there, young man. -[Robert] Robert Pretty. How do you do?
translation.zh: 你好啊 年轻人 我是罗伯特普莱提 你好

translation.en: Who's coming after you? -Captain Laska and his gangsters. -[Brown] Oh!
translation.zh: -谁在追你啊？ -拉斯卡船长和他的混混手下

translation.en: -[Pretty] Mr. Brown is an archaeologist. -Well, I'm an excavator.
translation.zh: 布朗先生是一名考古学家 我是个挖掘专家

translation.en: -You've come to dig up the mounds? -[Brown] Well…
translation.zh: 你是来挖掘土墩的吗？

translation.en: I'm afraid not. Uh, not today.
translation.zh: 恐怕不是 不是今天

translation.en: Excuse me.
translation.zh: 我先告辞了

translation.en: -Good luck with your gangsters, Robert. -[Robert chuckles] Thank you.
translation.zh: 祝你顺利搞定那些小混混 罗伯特 谢谢你

translation.en: [Brown] And you, with your dig, ma'am.
translation.zh: 也祝你的挖掘顺利 太太

translation.en: Ah, blast.
translation.zh: 真是可惜

translation.en: -Mr. Brown? -Yes?
translation.zh: -布朗先生？ -什么事？

translation.en: Billy Lyons. Uh, uh, from Mrs. Pretty.
translation.zh: 我是比利莱恩斯 这是普莱提太太给你的

translation.en: All right.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: Tell her Monday, 8:00 sharp.
translation.zh: 转告她 周一 八点整

translation.en: [Brown] I won't work for less than two pound a week.
translation.zh: 我每周要至少2英镑的工资

translation.en: And it's too far to bike, if you want a day's digging.
translation.zh: 你若想让我进行一整天的挖掘 骑自行车就太远了

translation.en: [Pretty] You could lodge with the Lyonses in the coach house.
translation.zh: 你可以和莱恩斯一家 一起住在马车房里

translation.en: Mr. Lyons is my chauffeur, and Mrs. Lyons is in charge of the kitchen.
translation.zh: 莱恩斯先生是我的司机 而莱恩斯太太则负责管理厨房

translation.en: -[Brown sighs] Well, I'll need help. -[Pretty] I could let you have one man.
translation.zh: 我需要帮手 我能给你安排一个助手

translation.en: [Brown] Two would be better.
translation.zh: 两个会更好

translation.en: [Pretty] I'm glad we could come to an arrangement after all, Mr. Brown.
translation.zh: 我很高兴我们最终还是达成了协议 布朗先生

translation.en: John Jacobs and Mr. Spooner are bringing the shepherd's hut.
translation.zh: 约翰雅各布斯和斯普纳先生 会把牧羊人小屋带过来

translation.en: I thought it might be useful in case of inclement weather.
translation.zh: 遇到恶劣天气时也许用得上

translation.en: Oh, that's very considerate.
translation.zh: 你想得真周到

translation.en: My son Robert is keen to assist you in any way.
translation.zh: 我儿子罗伯特 非常热切地想协助你

translation.en: If you find his presence irksome--
translation.zh: 如果你觉得他烦人的话…

translation.en: Oh, no, no, no. He can come.
translation.zh: 不 让他来吧

translation.en: You'll start with this one?
translation.zh: 你要从这个开始吗？

translation.en: [Brown] Yeah.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: I reckon we can forget that larger mound, Mrs. Pretty.
translation.zh: 还是忘了那个比较大的土墩吧 普莱提太太

translation.en: This one here, that's where we'll find something.
translation.zh: 这个 才是遗物的所在地

translation.en: Well, shan't hold you up. [chuckles softly]
translation.zh: 那么 我就不耽误你了

translation.en: [Brown] Thank you kindly.
translation.zh: 多谢

translation.en: If you ask me, the man should leave Mrs. Pretty's mounds well alone.
translation.zh: 要我说的话 那个男人 不应该碰普莱提太太的土墩

translation.en: -[maid] Thank you, ma'am. -[Pretty] Great, dear. Thank you.
translation.zh: -谢谢太太 -谢谢

translation.en: Darling, please be gentle. You'll knock me down.
translation.zh: 亲爱的 悠着点 你差点把我撞倒了

translation.en: [Robert] I'm sorry. Mr. Brown says to come.
translation.zh: 抱歉 布朗先生让你过去找他

translation.en: -Now? -[Robert] Yes.
translation.zh: -现在吗？ -对

translation.en: Well, thank you for the message.
translation.zh: 好吧 谢谢你给我传话

translation.en: Well, it looks like the kind of tray you get at a butcher's.
translation.zh: 看起来像肉铺里用的那种托盘

translation.en: And there's some blackness here, maybe indicating a fire was made.
translation.zh: 这些黑色的部分可能是火烧的痕迹

translation.en: Who are those men?
translation.zh: 那些人是谁啊？

translation.en: [Pretty] They're from the Ipswich Museum. Mr. Reid Moir telephoned me.
translation.zh: 他们是伊普斯威奇博物馆的人 摩尔先生给我打了电话

translation.en: He wanted to see how things were progressing, so I invited him.
translation.zh: 说想看看事情的进展 所以我就邀请他过来了

translation.en: Mrs. Pretty, this is Guy Maynard, our new curator.
translation.zh: 普莱提太太 这是盖伊梅纳德 我们的新馆长

translation.en: -How do you do? -[Pretty] Hello.
translation.zh: -你好吗？ -你好

translation.en: Hello, Brown.
translation.zh: 你好 布朗

translation.en: Maynard. Can I borrow you, please, for this here corner?
translation.zh: 梅纳德 能麻烦你过来搭把手吗？

translation.en: Jolly good.
translation.zh: 没问题

translation.en: [Brown] One.
translation.zh: 一

translation.en: -You have it? Two. -[Maynard] Yeah.
translation.zh: -抓稳了吗？二 -嗯

translation.en: -[Brown] Three! Blast. -[Maynard grunts]
translation.zh: 三 啊 靠

translation.en: Is that the sum of your labors?
translation.zh: 那就是你们努力的成果吗？

translation.en: [Brown] Excuse me.
translation.zh: 借过

translation.en: [Reid Moir] I must urge you, Mrs. Pretty, to support our Roman villa.
translation.zh: 普莱提太太 我促请你支持我们的罗马别墅工程

translation.en: War is looming. All hands are on deck to excavate before hostilities begin.
translation.zh: 战争迫在眉睫 在敌对行动爆发之前 我们需要全员出动进行挖掘

translation.en: And so, we must ask you to return Mr. Brown.
translation.zh: 因此我们得要求你归还布朗先生

translation.en: I'd like him to finish what he's started.
translation.zh: 我想让他完成他所开始的工程

translation.en: [Reid Moir chuckles] We may have found the largest Roman villa north of Felixstowe.
translation.zh: 我们可能找到了 费利克斯托北部最大的罗马别墅

translation.en: It's of far greater import, if… if you'll forgive me, than this…
translation.zh: 我们可能找到了 费利克斯托北部最大的罗马别墅 恕我直言 这可比你的小工程要重要得多

translation.en: minor venture.
translation.zh: 恕我直言 这可比你的小工程要重要得多

translation.en: -Then the choice is Mr. Brown's. -Excuse me.
translation.zh: 选择权在于布朗先生 不好意思 随着时间的推移 那块木头变成了一堆压实的沙子

translation.en: Time had altered that piece of wood to compacted sand.
translation.zh: 不好意思 随着时间的推移 那块木头变成了一堆压实的沙子

translation.en: I didn't guess its age correctly.
translation.zh: 我猜错其年龄了

translation.en: I speculated Viking, but I think that's older.
translation.zh: 我之前推测是维京时期 但我认为那还要更古老些

translation.en: -Anglo-Saxon. -That's most unlikely, Brown.
translation.zh: -盎格鲁-撒克逊时期 -不可能 布朗

translation.en: We should-- We need you back at the villa. That's what I'm here to say, and…
translation.zh: 别墅那里需要你 我过来就是想说这个 而且…

translation.en: and Mrs. Pretty has released you.
translation.zh: 普莱提太太也说你可以走了

translation.en: I have said it is your choice.
translation.zh: 我说选择权在于你

translation.en: Well, then I'll stay.
translation.zh: 那我选择留下

translation.en: Thank you kindly, ma'am.
translation.zh: 谢谢你 太太

translation.en: Excuse me.
translation.zh: 失陪一下

translation.en: Now, look here, Brown.
translation.zh: 布朗 听着 你的意思我们明白了

translation.en: You've made your point. You can have two pounds a week.
translation.zh: 每周付你2英镑就是了

translation.en: We'll give you a few days to finish off here, and then, as we're the only museum in the area,
translation.zh: 我们会给你几天时间善后 然后呢 鉴于我们是这地区唯一的博物馆

translation.en: I'd carefully consider where your future lies.
translation.zh: 我劝你还是为自己的未来着想

translation.en: Understood.
translation.zh: 明白

translation.en: [Robert] Mr. Brown's been telling us all sorts of things.
translation.zh: 布朗先生跟我们说了种种事情

translation.en: For instance, what's the most important part of an archaeologist's body?
translation.zh: 例如 作为一名考古学家 身上哪个部位最重要？

translation.en: -I don't know. -[clock chiming]
translation.zh: 不知道

translation.en: His nose.
translation.zh: 是鼻子

translation.en: If there's something there, he'll know it by the smell.
translation.zh: 如果有遗物的话 他能靠鼻子闻出来

translation.en: You're going to see your father this afternoon?
translation.zh: 今天下午去探望你父亲

translation.en: I… I'm afraid I'm needed here.
translation.zh: 我恐怕走不开 这里需要我

translation.en: -Um, please, may I get down? -If you're quite sure you've finished.
translation.zh: 我可以离席了吗？ 吃饱了就去吧

translation.en: [man] Boiled beef… on a hot day like this is unlikely to agree with anyone, Mrs. Lyons.
translation.zh: 大热天吃水煮牛肉 任谁都受不了 莱恩斯太太

translation.en: [Pretty] It was exactly like last time.
translation.zh: 上次也是这样

translation.en: [doctor] Mrs. Pretty, you produce all this acid because you're a worrier.
translation.zh: 普莱提太太 你的胃酸过多是操心太多所致

translation.en: We've spoken on this subject before.
translation.zh: 这个问题我们之前讨论过了

translation.en: -You must learn to stop worrying. -[sighs]
translation.zh: 你必须学会少操心

translation.en: [doctor] Otherwise, you'll give yourself an ulcer.
translation.zh: 否则的话 会患上胃溃疡的

translation.en: -Well… if that's what you think. -[doctor] Mm-hmm.
translation.zh: 是这样吗？

translation.en: Oh, you don't wanna be down there, Mrs. Pretty. That ain't safe.
translation.zh: 普莱提太太 别站在那里 那里不安全

translation.en: Spooner and John Jacobs are making supports. We can't continue without them now.
translation.zh: 斯普纳和约翰正在搭建支护结构 在那完成之前 我们无法继续

translation.en: I was reading Howard Carter's account of his excavation of the tomb of Tutankhamun.
translation.zh: 我读了霍华德卡特 对挖掘图坦卡蒙陵墓的叙述

translation.en: He stood at the threshold of the burial chamber,
translation.zh: 站在墓室的门槛上

translation.en: the first man to do so for 3,000 years,
translation.zh: 这个三千年以来首个踏入陵墓的人

translation.en: and he saw finger marks still on the paint.
translation.zh: 看到油漆表面上还残留着手指印

translation.en: He say, "Time lost its meaning."
translation.zh: 他说“时间失去了意义”

translation.en: It occurs to me that you might unearth human remains.
translation.zh: 我突然想到 你可能会挖掘出人类的遗骸

translation.en: [Brown] Yeah, that's possible.
translation.zh: 有这个可能

translation.en: [Pretty] We're digging down to meet the dead.
translation.zh: 我们掘地三尺 与亡者会面

translation.en: Disinterring them, in fact.
translation.zh: 事实上 是掘出他们的尸体

translation.en: [Brown] There's always coroner's inquests when remains are found.
translation.zh: 每当发现遗骸 都必须交由验尸官进行勘验

translation.en: The dead still get that courtesy, no matter how many centuries they've lain.
translation.zh: 无论入土了多少个世纪 亡者仍享有这个基本权利

translation.en: We can't dig down into the earth without considering that--
translation.zh: 如果要往地底下挖 就必须考虑到…

translation.en: [Pretty, muffled] Brown?
translation.zh: 布朗先生？

translation.en: Mr. Brown?
translation.zh: 布朗先生？

translation.en: Spooner! Jacob! Get help!
translation.zh: 斯普纳！雅各布斯！快去找人帮忙！

translation.en: [man] There! There! There!
translation.zh: 这里！

translation.en: Come on, Basil!
translation.zh: 撑着 巴兹尔

translation.en: [Pretty] Careful with his head.
translation.zh: 小心他的头

translation.en: [Pretty] Mr. Brown! Mr. Brown! Mr. Brown!
translation.zh: 布朗先生！

translation.en: Mr. Brown?
translation.zh: 布朗先生？

translation.en: -[Pretty] That's it. -[Jacobs] That's it.
translation.zh: -醒过来了 -醒过来了

translation.en: -[Brown gasps] -Mr. Brown. Mr. Brown.
translation.zh: 布朗先生

translation.en: You're all right now. You're all right. You're all right.
translation.zh: 你没事了 没事了

translation.en: [sighs, chuckles] You're all right.
translation.zh: 你没事了

translation.en: Into the library, Grateley. Lay him on the sofa.
translation.zh: 把他带到书房 格莱特利 让他躺在沙发上

translation.en: [Pretty] Did you see something?
translation.zh: 你看见什么了吗？

translation.en: [Brown] See something?
translation.zh: 什么意思？

translation.en: When you were gone.
translation.zh: 你昏迷的时候

translation.en: Something did come into my head.
translation.zh: 我脑海中确实浮现了某个画面

translation.en: What was it?
translation.zh: 什么画面？

translation.en: [clicks tongue] My, uh… my grandfather.
translation.zh: 我爷爷

translation.en: I have his name.
translation.zh: 我有着跟他相同的名字

translation.en: Basil Brown.
translation.zh: 巴兹尔布朗

translation.en: Farming man.
translation.zh: 他是个农民

translation.en: Taught me everything I know about Suffolk soil.
translation.zh: 所有关于萨福克土壤的知识 都是他传授给我的

translation.en: And you saw him?
translation.zh: 你看见他了？

translation.en: [Brown] Oh, I saw nothing at all. I was just…
translation.zh: 我什么都没看见 我只是…

translation.en: I just thought of him. [sighs]
translation.zh: 我只是想起他了

translation.en: Well… perhaps he saw you. [chuckles softly]
translation.zh: 也许他看见你了

translation.en: -Excuse me. -Mr. Brown, are you all right?
translation.zh: 不好意思 布朗先生 你没事吧？

translation.en: [Pretty] Mr. Brown!
translation.zh: 布朗先生！

translation.en: Mr. Brown, you have to rest!
translation.zh: 布朗先生 你必须休息

translation.en: See, Mrs. Pretty… this one is the one you like.
translation.zh: 你看 普莱提太太 这个你喜欢 并且想让我先着手的土墩

translation.en: It's the one you wanted me to start on. It's oval.
translation.zh: 这个你喜欢 并且想让我先着手的土墩 它呈椭圆形

translation.en: Like a hog's back.
translation.zh: 就像猪背岭一样

translation.en: -See? All the others, circular. -Yes.
translation.zh: 其它的都是圆形的

translation.en: Now, this land's been plowed for 1,000 year.
translation.zh: -是 -这片土地经历过长达千年的翻耕

translation.en: Now, supposing whoever plowed here…
translation.zh: 假设在这里进行翻耕的农民

translation.en: gradually knocked a bit off.
translation.zh: 一点一点地将土墩削低

translation.en: So, by the time robbers come along,
translation.zh: 等到盗墓贼来时

translation.en: they'd have sunk the flute into what they thought was the center.
translation.zh: 他们将竖井挖在 他们以为是土墩中心的位置

translation.en: -[Pretty] But it might not have been. -[Brown] That's right.
translation.zh: -但可能并不是 -没错

translation.en: East to west, that's my feeling.
translation.zh: 直觉告诉我 从东往西进行挖掘

translation.en: [chuckles] You say the word…
translation.zh: 只要你一声令下

translation.en: …and I'll dig.
translation.zh: 我就开挖

translation.en: [Robert] My plane crashed into the Arctic waste, you see.
translation.zh: 我的飞机坠毁在北极荒原上

translation.en: And when I woke up, 500 years had passed.
translation.zh: 当我醒来的时候 五百年已经过去了

translation.en: -So, now I'm stuck in the 25th century. -[Brown] What's that like, then?
translation.zh: 所以现在我被困在了二十五世纪 那里什么情况啊？

translation.en: Well, the Earth is controlled by Killer Kane, who's an extremely evil man.
translation.zh: 地球被杀手凯恩掌控着 他是个极其邪恶的男人

translation.en: [Brown] Like Hitler?
translation.zh: 就像希特勒吗？

translation.en: [chuckles] Yes, with an even worse mustache.
translation.zh: 对 不过他留了更丑的胡子

translation.en: Did the people who made these burial mounds have mustaches?
translation.zh: 建造这些土墩墓的那些人 也留胡子吗？

translation.en: [Brown] And beards.
translation.zh: 还留了络腮胡呢

translation.en: They were a very beardy lot.
translation.zh: 他们特喜欢留络腮胡

translation.en: Not like them there Romans. Now, they liked the close shave.
translation.zh: 罗马人就不同了 他们喜欢把脸刮得干干净净

translation.en: The Vikings and the space pilots are the same, really, aren't they?
translation.zh: 那么维京人和太空飞行员 其实是一样的呀

translation.en: They explore new lands and have battles in ships.
translation.zh: 他们都喜欢探索新土地 以及在舰上战斗

translation.en: Yeah, when you put it like that, I suppose they might be the same.
translation.zh: 是啊 你这么一说  他们好像确实是一样的

translation.en: [Robert] They come over all the time. There's an RAF base nearby.
translation.zh: 他们经常飞过这里 这附近有个皇家空军基地

translation.en: Would you like to fly, Mr. Brown?
translation.zh: 你想在空中飞行吗 布朗先生？

translation.en: [Brown] Oh, but I do.
translation.zh: 我确实飞起来了

translation.en: All over the cosmos, every time I look through my telescope.
translation.zh: 我的望远镜 带我飞遍了整个宇宙

translation.en: You… You have a telescope?
translation.zh: 你有望远镜哦？

translation.en: -I do. -[Robert] Did you bring it with you?
translation.zh: -是啊 -你带来了吗？

translation.en: [Brown] I did.
translation.zh: 带了啊

translation.en: Well, will you show me?
translation.zh: 能让我看看吗？

translation.en: I might.
translation.zh: 也许哦

translation.en: Cor! He likes to natter, he does.
translation.zh: 天啊 那孩子还真是罗嗦

translation.en: What was all that about space travel?
translation.zh: 瞎说什么太空旅行呢？

translation.en: [maid] Mr. Brown had an awful lot of books.
translation.zh: 布朗先生有好多书

translation.en: Came on his bike with a great parcel of them.
translation.zh: 他带着一大包裹的书 骑着自行车过来

translation.en: Sloan says some are in Norwegian.
translation.zh: 莱恩斯太太说一些还是挪威语书

translation.en: Shall we try the green silk?
translation.zh: 绿色丝绸连衣裙怎么样？

translation.en: -It's an old favorite, isn't it? -[Pretty] No.
translation.zh: -那是你的最爱 对吧？ -不

translation.en: The velvet with the lace.
translation.zh: 要那件天鹅绒蕾丝连衣裙

translation.en: [Grateley] Mrs. Lyons hopes it will agree.
translation.zh: 莱恩斯太太希望这不会引起不适

translation.en: [Pretty] How's your leg, Mr. Grateley?
translation.zh: 你的脚怎么样了 格莱特利先生？

translation.en: Oh, much better, ma'am. Thank you for inquiring.
translation.zh: 好多了 太太 谢谢关心

translation.en: Would you like the wireless? -[Pretty] Yes, please. -[clicks on]
translation.zh: -要打开收音机吗？ -好的 谢谢

translation.en: [radio announcer] …the Air Guard under the age of 32
translation.zh: …三十二岁以下的空军国民警卫队

translation.en: are now being asked to stand by
translation.zh: 被要求随时待命接受进一步培训

translation.en: for further training as RAF pilots or crew.
translation.zh: 被要求随时待命接受进一步培训 成为皇家空军飞行员或机组人员

translation.en: [Mrs. Lyons] She's only been here 12 year.
translation.zh: 她才在这里待了十二年

translation.en: -[Billy] Mm-hmm. -Came down from Cheshire.
translation.zh: 她从柴郡过来的

translation.en: Then she married the colonel.
translation.zh: 然后嫁给了上校

translation.en: He first met with Edith when she was still at school.
translation.zh: 他初遇伊迪丝的时候 她还是个学生

translation.en: And on his 17th birthday, he asked her to marry him.
translation.zh: 在她十七岁生日那天 他向她求婚了

translation.en: -She turned him down. -[Billy] Mm.
translation.zh: 但被她拒绝了

translation.en: She say she can't possibly leave her father.
translation.zh: 她说她不能离开自己的父亲

translation.en: [Mrs. Lyons] She cared for her father another 13 year, until he died.
translation.zh: 之后的十三年 她一直照顾她的父亲 直到他去世

translation.en: [Billy] After 13 years.
translation.zh: 十三年

translation.en: [Mrs. Lyons] She finally accepted the colonel's proposal.
translation.zh: 她最终接受了上校的求婚

translation.en: He been asking every year on her birthday. [Billy] On her birthday.
translation.zh: 这十三年来 他每年都在她生日那天向她求婚

translation.en: [Mrs. Lyons] Just after they had Robert…
translation.zh: 罗伯特刚出生后不久

translation.en: her husband went and died too.
translation.zh: 她的丈夫也去世了

translation.en: [Mrs. Lyons] Imagine that.
translation.zh: 想象一下

translation.en: [Brown] Do any of you want to look through this?
translation.zh: 你们谁想看一下吗？

translation.en: -[man] I thought we'd sit down on that. -[Brown] You have a go.
translation.zh: -还以为你是想让我坐下呢 -换你试试

translation.en: That's right.
translation.zh: 对 就这样

translation.en: -[Jacobs] I'm gonna follow you back home. -[group laughing]
translation.zh: 我要跟着你回家了

translation.en: [Brown] Wait! Wait, for Christ's sake!
translation.zh: 等等！拜托等一下！

translation.en: [Brown] Come on.
translation.zh: 快啊

translation.en: [Brown] Maynard! Maynard!
translation.zh: 梅纳德！

translation.en: They found an iron rivet at the burial mound at Snape, didn't they?
translation.zh: 他们在位于斯内普的土墩墓里 找到了一颗铁铆钉 对吧？

translation.en: [Maynard] Snape? Basil, what have you found?
translation.zh: 斯内普？巴兹尔 你找到什么了？

translation.en: My goodness, Basil.
translation.zh: 我的天哪 巴兹尔

translation.en: -[Spooner] Right. Any joy, Basil? -[Brown] Coming along together.
translation.zh: -进展如何 巴兹尔？ -还不错

translation.en: Mr. Spooner, will you bring my tape measure from the hut?
translation.zh: 斯普纳先生 能帮我从小屋里拿出卷尺吗？

translation.en: One of you best get Mrs. Pretty down here.
translation.zh: 你们谁去把普莱提太太叫过来

translation.en: -[Jacobs] She's gone up to London. -She what? How long?
translation.zh: -她去伦敦了 -什么？ 去多久？

translation.en: [Jacobs] London, with Robert. Couple of days.
translation.zh: 她和罗伯特一起去了伦敦 去几天

translation.en: [sighs] Blast.
translation.zh: 靠

translation.en: Right, boys. Here we go. Come on together.
translation.zh: 好吧 孩子们 开工了

translation.en: Better have something to show Mrs. Pretty when she get back.
translation.zh: 在普莱提太太回来前 我们最好做出点成绩来

translation.en: -[knocking on door] -[Grateley] And the crystal glasses!
translation.zh: 别忘了水晶杯

translation.en: No, no, no. Side door, please.
translation.zh: 不行 你得走侧门

translation.en: -Mrs. Pretty back from London yet? -Mrs. Pretty's about to dine.
translation.zh: 普莱提太太从伦敦回来了吗？ -普莱提太太正准备用餐 -我说了这是急事

translation.en: [Brown] I told you it was urgent.
translation.zh: -普莱提太太正准备用餐 -我说了这是急事

translation.en: [Grateley] Mr. Brown, I'm sure you wouldn't like to interfere with--
translation.zh: 布朗先生 我相信 你也不想打扰到太太吃晚餐

translation.en: [Pretty] It's all right, Mr. Grateley.
translation.zh: 没关系 格莱特利先生

translation.en: -Is it Mr. Brown? -[Pretty] Yes, darling. Darling
translation.zh: -那是布朗先生吗？ -是 亲爱的 小心点

translation.en: I think you'd better come and see.
translation.zh: 你最好出来看看

translation.en: [Brown] That's a ship.
translation.zh: 那是一艘船

translation.en: [Robert] How do you mean, a ship?
translation.zh: 一艘船是什么意思？

translation.en: [Brown] Oh, well, that's a ship that's been buried in the mound.
translation.zh: 那是一艘被埋在土墩里的船

translation.en: [Robert] Why would anyone want to bury a ship?
translation.zh: 怎么会有人想把船埋起来呢？

translation.en: [Brown] Well, I expect because that's a grave.
translation.zh: 我想那是因为这是个坟墓

translation.en: [Robert] Whose grave?
translation.zh: 谁的坟墓呀？

translation.en: [Brown] Well, I'd expect this is a grave of a… a great man.
translation.zh: 我想这是一位伟人的坟墓

translation.en: A warrior…
translation.zh: 一名战士

translation.en: or a king.
translation.zh: 或者一位国王

translation.en: They must have pulled his ship all the way up that there hill from the river.
translation.zh: 他们一定是将他的船 从那条河中拉到这片丘陵上

translation.en: Now, they'd have put it on ropes, and they'd have hauled it over logs.
translation.zh: 首先在船底垫起滚木 再用绳索拖着前進

translation.en: Men, horses. It must have taken hundreds of 'em. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 肯定动用了上百人力、上百匹马

translation.en: I don't expect them to go to all this trouble for any little squirt.
translation.zh: 他们可不会为了某个小人物 如此大费周章

translation.en: Can you imagine the send-off they'd be giving him?
translation.zh: 你能想象他们为他办了 多么隆重的葬礼吗？

translation.en: The songs they'd be singing. [laughs]
translation.zh: 为他唱了多么悲壮的挽歌吗？

translation.en: They'd have drunk Mr. Spooner under the table.
translation.zh: 他的白事酒宴 我看连斯普纳先生都会喝趴下

translation.en: -[Brown and Pretty laugh] -[Robert] Vikings?
translation.zh: 是维京人吗？

translation.en: [sniffles] Well, I… I think that's older.
translation.zh: 我认为要更古老些

translation.en: Maynard disagrees, but I think it's Anglo-Saxon.
translation.zh: 梅纳德不认同 但我认为是盎格鲁-撒克逊人

translation.en: Now, this is your doing, John Jacobs, 'cause you found the first rivet.
translation.zh: 这都归功于你 约翰雅各布斯 因为你找到了第一颗铆钉

translation.en: -[Jacobs chuckles] -That's right, Mrs. Pretty. He did.
translation.zh: 没错 普莱提太太 他确实找到了

translation.en: Congratulations, Mr. Brown.
translation.zh: 恭喜你 布朗先生

translation.en: [Brown chuckles] Well, you thought there was something, didn't you? I had my feeling.
translation.zh: -你不也觉得底下有东西了吗？ -我的确有预感

translation.en: That you did, Mrs. Pretty. That you did.
translation.zh: 的确啊 普莱提太太 的确

translation.en: [Pretty] Oh, John.
translation.zh: 干得好 约翰

translation.en: -Congratulations, Mr. Spooner. -[Spooner] Thank you, ma'am.
translation.zh: -恭喜你 斯普纳先生 -谢谢你 太太

translation.en: [Brown] We couldn't have done it without this young man here.
translation.zh: 这个年轻人也功不可没啊

translation.en: [softly] Robert, a ship!
translation.zh: 罗伯特 一艘船耶

translation.en: [Robert] Thank you. Mr. Brown.
translation.zh: 谢谢你 布朗先生

translation.en: [Brown] Well, there's a lot of earth to… to shift now.
translation.zh: 接下来要挖的土可多了

translation.en: But who knows?
translation.zh: 但谁知道呢？

translation.en: I'm pretty sure it continues further.
translation.zh: 我很确定要努力的远不止于此

translation.en: [man] Evening.
translation.zh: 晚上好

translation.en: Evening.
translation.zh: 晚上好

translation.en: [Reid Moir] Do you realize what this means?
translation.zh: 你知道这意味着什么吗？

translation.en: It's going to change everything for Ipswich.
translation.zh: 伊普斯威奇博物馆的未来 将会彻底改变

translation.en: We'll be the envy of every museum in the country.
translation.zh: 我们将成为 国内所有博物馆的眼红对象

translation.en: -You're gonna get wet, Mrs. Pretty. -[Pretty] I'm afraid I already am.
translation.zh: -你会被雨淋湿的 普莱提太太 -我已经湿透了

translation.en: [Pretty] Mr. Reid Moir has kindly offered to take charge of the dig.
translation.zh: 摩尔先生非常慷慨地表示 愿意接手挖掘工程

translation.en: I turned his generous offer down.
translation.zh: 我拒绝了他慷慨的提议

translation.en: -You didn't. -[Pretty] I did.
translation.zh: -不是吧？ -是的

translation.en: [chuckles, splutters] What did he say?
translation.zh: 他说了什么？

translation.en: He said I couldn't keep it to myself, which is true.
translation.zh: 他说我不能将遗物占为己有 事实确实如此

translation.en: [chuckling] I bet he blew his gasket.
translation.zh: 他肯定气炸了

translation.en: In the meantime, I've asked my cousin, Rory Lomax, to come.
translation.zh: 在此期间 我让我表弟罗伊洛马克斯过来了

translation.en: -[Brown] Right. -I can see you need another pair of hands.
translation.zh: -好 -我看得出来你缺帮手

translation.en: He's only an amateur, but then, so is Mr. Reid Moir.
translation.zh: 他只是个门外汉 不过嘛 摩尔先生也是如此

translation.en: -Mrs. Pretty, you better go in the shed. -Oh, yes.
translation.zh: -普莱提太太 还是去小屋里避雨吧 -哦 好

translation.en: -[Brown] You're gonna get very wet here. -[Pretty] I will.
translation.zh: 不然会被淋成落汤鸡的

translation.en: [Pretty] I wanted to thank you for your patience with Robert.
translation.zh: 我想感谢你对罗伯特如此有耐心

translation.en: He can hardly wait to see you in the mornings.
translation.zh: 他每天早上都等不及想出来见你

translation.en: [Brown] Well, keeps me on me toes, having him around.
translation.zh: 有他在身边 我也不敢有丝毫懈怠

translation.en: Do you have children?
translation.zh: 你有小孩吗？

translation.en: No, uh, we, uh…
translation.zh: 没有 我们…

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 没有

translation.en: [Pretty] The servants tell me you've studied everything, from Latin to geology.
translation.zh: 仆人们告诉我 从拉丁语到地质学 你全都研究过

translation.en: [Brown] Well, a little education is a dangerous thing.
translation.zh: 浅学误人嘛

translation.en: [Pretty] Hmm. Apparently, you've written a book. [Brown] I have.
translation.zh: -听说你还写了一本书 -确实

translation.en: A guide to astronomical maps and charts,
translation.zh: 是一本天文图指南

translation.en: to make them accessible to ordinary men.
translation.zh: 以便其内容能为一般民众所理解

translation.en: [Brown] I left school when I was 12.
translation.zh: 我十二岁就被迫辍学

translation.en: Always had a hunger to study.
translation.zh: 我一直都对知识充满渴望

translation.en: [Pretty] I got a place at London University.
translation.zh: 我考上了伦敦大学

translation.en: My father wouldn't hear of it.
translation.zh: 但我父亲不让我去

translation.en: Would you have dinner with me?
translation.zh: 可否赏脸一起吃晚饭？

translation.en: Well… thank you. Yes.
translation.zh: 好的 谢谢你

translation.en: [Brown] Evening, Vera.
translation.zh: 晚上好 维拉

translation.en: Surprise for you, Basil, in your room.
translation.zh: 房间有惊喜 巴兹尔

translation.en: [Brown] Right.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: May.
translation.zh: 梅

translation.en: I brought you some fresh shirts.
translation.zh: 我给你带了些新衬衫

translation.en: -[Brown chuckles] -About time, I say.
translation.zh: 也是时候了

translation.en: -Are you pleased to see me? -Of course I am.
translation.zh: -见到我你高兴吗？ -当然了

translation.en: -You didn't know I was coming, did you? -[Brown] No. No, I didn't.
translation.zh: -你不知道我要来吧？ -不 不知道

translation.en: I did tell you.
translation.zh: 我跟你说过了

translation.en: In my last letter.
translation.zh: 在上一封信里

translation.en: [Brown] Oh, I was saving them for the weekend.
translation.zh: 我打算留着周末再看的

translation.en: I've been working every hour. You know what I'm like. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 我每天夜以继日地工作 你也懂我的

translation.en: Yes… I do.
translation.zh: 是 我懂

translation.en: [Brown] I'm very busy.
translation.zh: 我很忙

translation.en: -It looks like it. Nowhere to sit in here. -[Brown] There's a lot going on here.
translation.zh: -看得出来 连坐的地方都没了 -有好多事要处理

translation.en: -What's that? -I said there's nowhere to sit down.
translation.zh: -你说什么？ -我说这里连坐的地方都没了

translation.en: [Brown] Yeah. Sorry about that. It's all-- So much going on.
translation.zh: 不好意思 真的太忙了

translation.en: You got something to show me? I think you have. I can see it in your eyes.
translation.zh: 你有东西想让我看吧？ 看你的眼神就知道了

translation.en: I'm not saying anything.
translation.zh: 我什么都没说

translation.en: [maid] There's Mr. Brown with a woman.
translation.zh: 布朗先生和一个女人在一起呢

translation.en: I suppose it's his wife. You know, she writes to him every day.
translation.zh: 那应该是他的妻子 她天天都给他写信呢

translation.en: Come in.
translation.zh: 进来吧

translation.en: Mr. Brown sends his apologies, ma'am.
translation.zh: 太太 布朗先生让我代他向你道歉

translation.en: That's all. Thank you, Ellen. [sighs]
translation.zh: 可以了 谢谢你 艾伦

translation.en: [Brown] A man could dig the earth his whole life through
translation.zh: 有些人这辈子就算再拼命挖

translation.en: and not find anything like I've discovered here.
translation.zh: 也找不到这样的宝贝

translation.en: -[May] She's beautiful, all right. -[Brown] Yeah, she's beautiful.
translation.zh: -好美的一艘船 -确实很美

translation.en: [May] You'll have to watch your back with a thing like this.
translation.zh: 手上有这种宝贝 你得当心点才行

translation.en: [Brown] What do you mean?
translation.zh: 你什么意思？

translation.en: [May] Everyone's gonna want a piece of this here ship, and this is your find.
translation.zh: 大家肯定都会想分一杯羹 -但这是你的发现 -梅

translation.en: [Brown] Oh, May…
translation.zh: -但这是你的发现 -梅

translation.en: [May] Don't let Ipswich Museum take your glory.
translation.zh: 别让伊普斯威奇博物馆抢走你的功劳

translation.en: -[Brown] He's not gonna take-- -[May] Or that lady at the manor.
translation.zh: -他不会… -还有这个庄园的女主人

translation.en: -She should be upping your wages again. -[Brown] She's supportive.
translation.zh: -她该给你涨工资了 你问过没？ -她非常支持我

translation.en: -[May] You asked? -[Brown] I ain't gonna ask for more.
translation.zh: 我不能要求更多了 梅

translation.en: [Brown] Well, she's very, very gracious, Mrs. Pretty.
translation.zh: 普莱提太太她已经很慷慨了

translation.en: [May] Your heart's lost to this Viking maiden, I can tell.
translation.zh: 这艘维京长船 已经俘获了你的心 对吧？

translation.en: [Brown] Ah, May, you sure you don't want to stay the night?
translation.zh: 梅 你确定不要留下来过夜吗？

translation.en: I'll miss my lift back.
translation.zh: 我会错过回去的车

translation.en: [Brown] Right, yeah, um…
translation.zh: 也是

translation.en: Well, thanks for coming, May.
translation.zh: 谢谢你过来 梅

translation.en: [sighs] I do miss you.
translation.zh: 我很想念你

translation.en: -I've been reading your books for company. -You haven't.
translation.zh: 我都在看你的书 好让自己有个伴儿 -你骗人 -真的

translation.en: -[May] I have. -[scoffs]
translation.zh: -你骗人 -真的

translation.en: [laughing] Hell, it's not much company, is it?
translation.zh: 天哪 那不是什么好伴儿吧？

translation.en: -[May] No, they're hard work, I tell you. -They are.
translation.zh: -不是 超费脑子的 -确实

translation.en: Right. Well, it's good of you to bring my shirts.
translation.zh: -谢谢你给我带了衬衫 -嗯

translation.en: All right.
translation.zh: 先走了

translation.en: [Brown] I'll read them letters tonight.
translation.zh: 我今晚会把信都看了

translation.en: -[May] Bye, then. -[Brown] Bye.
translation.zh: -再见 -再见

translation.en: Blast!
translation.zh: 糟糕

translation.en: -Let me help. -[Brown] Right.
translation.zh: -让我来帮你 -好吧

translation.en: Right, then. Get around that side and take this tarp.
translation.zh: -让我来帮你 -好吧 绕过去那边 把油布拉过去

translation.en: That's… That's right. That's right. There's a stake there behind you.
translation.zh: 对 你身后有个木桩

translation.en: Pull it hard.
translation.zh: 用力拉

translation.en: [Brown] Where in God's name did you come from?
translation.zh: 你从哪来的？

translation.en: [young man] I rode, actually, on my motorbike from Ipswich. [sniffles]
translation.zh: 我从伊普斯威奇博物馆 骑摩托车过来的

translation.en: I'm Rory Lomax.
translation.zh: 我是罗伊洛马克斯

translation.en: [Brown] Aye. Did Reid Moir send you?
translation.zh: 是里德摩尔派你来的吗？

translation.en: -From the museum? -[thunder rumbles]
translation.zh: 博物馆的那位

translation.en: I'm Edith Pretty's cousin.
translation.zh: 我是伊迪丝普莱提的表弟

translation.en: She telephoned, asked me to come. -Said you needed an extra pair of hands. -All right.
translation.zh: 她给我打了电话让我过来 说你需要帮手

translation.en: I pointed out my general lack of skill, but she was undeterred.
translation.zh: 我还强调了自己技能不足 但她并没有因此而动摇

translation.en: Right. Well…
translation.zh: 嗯 好吧

translation.en: no doubt you'll hear that my name is Brown. Basil Brown.
translation.zh: 那你肯定也听说了我名字叫布朗 -巴兹尔布朗 -幸会

translation.en: [Rory] Good to meet you.
translation.zh: -巴兹尔布朗 -幸会

translation.en: [Brown] Now, it's gonna be raining for a while, so go on and take a seat. [sniffles]
translation.zh: 这场雨怕是要下一阵子了 先坐下吧

translation.en: I expect you'd, uh, be wet, coming from Ipswich on a motorbike.
translation.zh: 从博物馆骑摩托车过来 应该全身都湿透了吧？

translation.en: -[Rory] I was, rather. -[Brown] Yeah.
translation.zh: 也还好 开始下雨时我也正好赶到了

translation.en: -[Rory] Just caught me at the end. -[Brown] Right.
translation.zh: 也还好 开始下雨时我也正好赶到了 好 我去生个炉子

translation.en: Well, I'll light the stove. Would you like some tea?
translation.zh: 好 我去生个炉子 -要喝茶吗？ -好啊 谢谢

translation.en: [Rory chuckles] Yes, please.
translation.zh: -要喝茶吗？ -好啊 谢谢

translation.en: [Brown] I think we may have found, um, an old, uh, Anglo-Saxon ship.
translation.zh: 我认为我们可能找到了 一艘盎格鲁-撒克逊时期的战船

translation.en: When this rain clears tomorrow, maybe you can see what we're doing.
translation.zh: 等明天雨停了 带你去看看我们在做什么吧

translation.en: -Yeah? -How very exciting.
translation.zh: 实在是振奋人心

translation.en: Yeah, it's all right.
translation.zh: 嗯 还不错

translation.en: -[Jacobs] Not gonna cover it. -[Brown] Get the second tarp.
translation.zh: 掀开第二块油布

translation.en: -Pass me the hammer, please. -[Jacobs] Right.
translation.zh: -麻烦给我递一下锤子 -好

translation.en: [Spooner] All right, then.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: [Brown] Lift up.
translation.zh: 提起来

translation.en: -[panting] -[Brown] That's right.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: Rory!
translation.zh: 罗伊！

translation.en: Hello, Spud.
translation.zh: 嘿 小不点

translation.en: [grunts] Arrived in the night. Didn't want to wake you. Where's your mother?
translation.zh: 我昨晚半夜到的 不想吵醒你 你母亲呢？

translation.en: -[steam engine approaching] -[Robert] Oh, she's gone to London.
translation.zh: 她去伦敦了

translation.en: [man] Who knows if we'll still be alive in a year?
translation.zh: 谁知道一年后我们是否还活着？

translation.en: [announcer on loudspeaker] The yellow and green balls denote gas.
translation.zh: 黄色和绿色的球代表毒气弹

translation.en: -Red denotes high explosives. -[children laughing]
translation.zh: 红色代表高能炸药

translation.en: [announcer] Red stripes are incendiary bombs.
translation.zh: 红色条纹代表燃烧弹

translation.en: If you are caught on the streets during an air raid,
translation.zh: 如果空袭发生时你正好在大街上

translation.en: you must know the appropriate response to each form of attack.
translation.zh: 你必须知道如何适当地应对各项攻击

translation.en: No, don't throw them about!
translation.zh: 不 不是让你们乱扔的！

translation.en: [Pretty] I was rushing to get here on time.
translation.zh: 我急匆匆地赶了过来

translation.en: Might that have affected the results?
translation.zh: 会不会有可能影响了结果？

translation.en: [doctor] Possibly, but the, uh, underlying condition is there.
translation.zh: 有可能 但潜在的疾病仍然存在

translation.en: The rheumatic fever you had as a child, it, uh, damaged the valves of your heart.
translation.zh: 你小时候患过风湿热 导致你的心脏瓣膜受到损害

translation.en: Irreparably, I'm afraid.
translation.zh: 恐怕已无法修复

translation.en: Another attack is likely to be much… more serious.
translation.zh: 再次发作的话 情况可能会更严重

translation.en: Possibly even fatal.
translation.zh: 甚至可能致命

translation.en: -Is there nothing else that can be done? -[doctor] I'm sorry. I… I… I wish I had better news.
translation.zh: -就没有其他办法了吗？ -抱歉 我也希望能告诉你好消息

translation.en: [Grateley] Mr. Reid Moir is here, ma'am, with some other gentlemen.
translation.zh: 里德摩尔先生过来了 还带着几位先生

translation.en: They wouldn't stop to give me their names.
translation.zh: 他们不肯停下来告诉我名字

translation.en: Then they're trespassing. Where are they?
translation.zh: 那就是私闯民宅了 他们在哪？

translation.en: -On their way to the mounds. -Fetch them, quickly.
translation.zh: -正在前往土墩 -快去把他们追回来

translation.en: -Right. -[Pretty] Lyons?
translation.zh: -正在前往土墩 -快去把他们追回来 莱恩斯？

translation.en: [Brown] Now, I've been reading up about the Oseberg Ship.
translation.zh: 我最近一直在研究奥塞格号

translation.en: That's a Viking ship they found in Norway.
translation.zh: 那是一艘在挪威发现的维京船

translation.en: There was a burial chamber in the center, roofed.
translation.zh: 船中间有个有屋顶的墓室

translation.en: It's a bit like we imagine Noah's Ark.
translation.zh: 跟我们想象中的诺亚方舟有点像

translation.en: Course, any roof here would have caved in long ago.
translation.zh: 当然 这艘船的甲板早已经塌陷了

translation.en: See, this line here.
translation.zh: 你看这条线

translation.en: The ground is higher, but this soil is darker.
translation.zh: 这地面较高 但土壤颜色较暗

translation.en: So you think there's something beneath?
translation.zh: 你觉得底下有东西？

translation.en: Well, we may know by the end of today.
translation.zh: 今天结束前我们也许就会知道了

translation.en: Ye gods!
translation.zh: 我的老天爷！

translation.en: This is incredible!
translation.zh: 太不可思议了

translation.en: [Reid Moir] We at the Ipswich Museum pride ourselves on our work,
translation.zh: 我们伊普斯威奇博物馆 对我们的工作感到无比自豪

translation.en: and I… I think you'll agree that it's rock solid.
translation.zh: 我想你也会同意 我们做得非常出色

translation.en: -[Brown] You… You need to stop there. -I beg your pardon?
translation.zh: 请你止步 -你说什么？ -此遗址极其脆弱 而且不安全

translation.en: This is a very delicate site, and it ain't safe.
translation.zh: -你说什么？ -此遗址极其脆弱 而且不安全

translation.en: Uh, not for a man of your size.
translation.zh: 尤其是对你这体型而言

translation.en: Is this your work?
translation.zh: 这是你做的？

translation.en: Uh, yes. I'm Basil Brown, excavator.
translation.zh: 对 我是挖掘专家 巴兹尔布朗

translation.en: [clears throat] Well, Basil Brown, excavator…
translation.zh: 我说 挖掘专家 巴兹尔布朗

translation.en: I am Charles Phillips, archaeologist,
translation.zh: 我是考古学家 查尔斯菲利普斯

translation.en: and I'm here to tell you that,
translation.zh: 我来是要告诉你

translation.en: as this is a find of national interest,
translation.zh: 由于此项考古发现涉及国家利益

translation.en: the British Museum will be taking charge.
translation.zh: 其挖掘工程将由大英博物馆负责

translation.en: Your work…
translation.zh: 你所做的…

translation.en: looks, thankfully, decent,
translation.zh: 看起来还算不错 谢天谢地

translation.en: but your excavating service is no longer required.
translation.zh: 但这里已不再需要你的挖掘服务

translation.en: Am… Am I to understand that you will be personally taking over?
translation.zh: 我没理解错的话 你是要亲自接管这项工程吗？

translation.en: Grimes, I have never seen anything like it.
translation.zh: 葛莱姆斯 我从未见过如此壮丽的遗址

translation.en: -Quite, sir. -Brailesford.
translation.zh: 确实啊 大人 -布雷斯福德 -是

translation.en: -Sir. -[Phillips] Cancel everything I've got.
translation.zh: -布雷斯福德 -是 取消我所有的行程

translation.en: Find out who's free. We need Piggott.
translation.zh: 查一下谁有空 我们需要皮戈特

translation.en: -Find us lodgings, as near as you can. -[Brailesford] Yes, sir.
translation.zh: -给我们找住宿 越近越好 -是 大人

translation.en: [Reid Moir] That dark soil in the middle, C.W., looks very promising.
translation.zh: 中间那片颜色较暗的土壤 看起来很有盼头

translation.en: You men, finish up, and don't move another pebble!
translation.zh: 你们赶紧收工 别再碰一粒沙子

translation.en: [Brown] Excuse me, Mr. Phillips.
translation.zh: 不好意思 菲利普斯先生

translation.en: [splutters] I'm not employed by you.
translation.zh: 我不受雇于你

translation.en: I'm employed by Mrs. Pretty,
translation.zh: 我受雇于普莱提太太

translation.en: and I'll keep on working until she tells me different.
translation.zh: 除非她让我停工 否则我将继续工作

translation.en: An ad hoc team from a provincial museum cannot be left in charge.
translation.zh: 这项工程不能交给 一支省博物馆的特设小组负责

translation.en: Mrs. Pretty must see that.
translation.zh: 普莱提太太必须明白这点

translation.en: John, a minute is all I need. I… I know she'll want to hear this.
translation.zh: 约翰 我只需要一分钟 她会想听听这个消息的

translation.en: -All right, all right. Wait here. -Right.
translation.zh: -好啦 在这里等一下 -好

translation.en: [Grateley] She'll see you tomorrow morning at 10:30. She must know what I found.
translation.zh: -她明早十点半见你 -不 她必须知道我发现了什么

translation.en: -[Grateley] Don't push it, old boy! -[Brown] She must know!
translation.zh: -别得寸进尺了 -她必须知道我发现了什么

translation.en: -[slams] -[Brown] John!
translation.zh: 约翰

translation.en: -Is he gone, Mr. Grateley? -[Brown] It's not Grateley.
translation.zh: 他走了吗 格莱特利先生？ 我不是格莱特利先生

translation.en: I… I'm sorry for disturbing you, but I believe…
translation.zh: 很抱歉打扰你 但我相信

translation.en: we may have found a burial chamber in the ship.
translation.zh: 我们在船里找到了一个墓室

translation.en: -Does Mr. Phillips know? -[Brown] I don't work for Mr. Phillips.
translation.zh: -菲利普斯先生知道吗？ -我不效力于菲利普斯先生

translation.en: What are your wishes?
translation.zh: 你希望我怎么做？

translation.en: I, uh… He just informed me that, by order of the Ministry of Works,
translation.zh: 他刚刚通知我 根据工程部的命令

translation.en: the site must be placed under his control.
translation.zh: 该遗址必须置于他的管制之下

translation.en: Well, uh… [sighs]
translation.zh: 那…

translation.en: …that's that, then.
translation.zh: 就这样了

translation.en: [Brown, muffled] Well, I… I can carry on for one more day… if that's what you'd like.
translation.zh: 如果你想要的话 我能再继续工作一天

translation.en: Are… Are you poorly, Mrs. Pretty?
translation.zh: 你病了吗 普莱提太太？

translation.en: Perhaps you might, um…
translation.zh: 麻烦你

translation.en: might ring the bell for me.
translation.zh: 替我响一下铃

translation.en: Right.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: He's got no right to dictate to you.
translation.zh: 他无权指使你

translation.en: This ship's only appearing because of you.
translation.zh: 能找到这艘船 都是多亏了你

translation.en: Don't forget why you wanted it begun.
translation.zh: 别忘了你当初为什么要让我开始挖掘

translation.en: Now, you said that was a feeling. Your feeling is right.
translation.zh: 你说你有预感 你的预感是对的

translation.en: -Mr. Brown seems to have found his way in. -[Grateley] Mr. Brown.
translation.zh: 布朗先生溜进屋里了 布朗先生

translation.en: All right.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: [Grateley] Is there anything I could bring you?
translation.zh: 太太 你需要些什么吗？

translation.en: Fetch Ellen for me, please.
translation.zh: 麻烦你去把艾伦叫来

translation.en: [Phillips] Mrs. Pretty is keen to keep you on,
translation.zh: 普莱提太太坚持要留住你们

translation.en: so we'll make good use of you.
translation.zh: 所以呢 我们会善加利用你们的

translation.en: Your primary task will be to keep the site in order.
translation.zh: 你们的主要任务是保持场地整洁有序

translation.en: So, I want the tumulus dug back to an area of four feet on either side,
translation.zh: 我要你们将土墩向两侧挖开1.2米

translation.en: and I want those spoil heaps removed.
translation.zh: 然后再把那些弃土堆清除掉

translation.en: From now on,
translation.zh: 从现在开始 未经我的明示许可

translation.en: you're not to set foot in the body of the ship without my express permission.
translation.zh: 从现在开始 未经我的明示许可 不得涉足船体

translation.en: Carry on.
translation.zh: 继续干活

translation.en: [Jacobs] Are you gonna put up with that, Basil?
translation.zh: 你打算容忍下去吗 巴兹尔？

translation.en: [Robert] Hello, Mr. Brown.
translation.zh: 你好 布朗先生

translation.en: -My mother's got her heartburn. -Oh, I'm sorry to hear that.
translation.zh: 我母亲的胃灼热又发作了 很遗憾听到这消息

translation.en: She has to have peace and quiet. I made her this.
translation.zh: 她需要清净 -我给她弄了这个 -这火箭做得还真不错

translation.en: -[Brown] Well, that's a very fine rocket. -Where are you going?
translation.zh: -我给她弄了这个 -这火箭做得还真不错 你要去哪啊？

translation.en: Oh, I… Oh, I have to go home now.
translation.zh: 我得回家了

translation.en: When will you be back?
translation.zh: 那你什么时候回来？

translation.en: Well, uh… I'm sorry, Robert. I…
translation.zh: 那个… 抱歉 罗伯特

translation.en: I am.
translation.zh: 真的很抱歉

translation.en: Uh, but, Mr. Brown…
translation.zh: 布朗先生 可是…

translation.en: Mr. Brown!
translation.zh: 布朗先生！

translation.en: -Mr. Brown! -[Rory] It seems I'm out of a job.
translation.zh: 布朗先生！ 看来我失业了

translation.en: [Rory] Phillips won't let us in his ship.
translation.zh: 菲利普斯不让我们碰他的船

translation.en: His ship? Really?
translation.zh: 他的船？拜托

translation.en: I thought I might take some photographs. It could make a useful record.
translation.zh: 我想拍些照片留作记录 也许用得上 你介意吗？

translation.en: -Would you mind? -Not at all.
translation.zh: 我想拍些照片留作记录 也许用得上 你介意吗？ 完全不介意 别拍我就行

translation.en: -As long as they're not of me. -[camera clicks]
translation.zh: 完全不介意 别拍我就行

translation.en: Can't say I blame Brown.
translation.zh: 我得说 我不怪布朗 这么一个好男人

translation.en: Such a decent man doesn't deserve Phillips.
translation.zh: 我得说 我不怪布朗 这么一个好男人 不该被菲利普斯糟蹋

translation.en: Blame him?
translation.zh: 怪他？

translation.en: Well, he left this morning. Didn't you know?
translation.zh: 他今早离开了 你不知道吗？

translation.en: Where's Robert?
translation.zh: 罗伯特呢？

translation.en: You don't have another job?
translation.zh: 你没有其他工作吗？

translation.en: I'll write to Maynard, and he'll give me something.
translation.zh: 我会写信给梅纳德 他会给我安排点什么的

translation.en: [May] Did you tell Mrs. Pretty you were leaving?
translation.zh: 你有跟普莱提太太说你要离开吗？

translation.en: [Brown] I thought I'd let her work it out herself.
translation.zh: 让她自己弄明白吧

translation.en: And that's the thanks she gets for giving you the opportunity in the first place?
translation.zh: 她当初给了你这个机会 你是这样答谢人家的吗？

translation.en: Mark my words, May, I won't receive any credit.
translation.zh: 记住我的话 梅 我分不到半点功劳

translation.en: -I won't even be a footnote. -[May] Is that why you took the job?
translation.zh: 甚至连名字都不会被提及 -你接这活儿就是为了功劳？ -我总不能留下当苦工啊

translation.en: -For credit? -How can I stay on?
translation.zh: -你接这活儿就是为了功劳？ -我总不能留下当苦工啊

translation.en: Is that why you've been digging your whole life for barely enough
translation.zh: -你接这活儿就是为了功劳？ -我总不能留下当苦工啊 你一生挖土 赚那么一丁点钱 为的就是功劳？

translation.en: to cover our rent?
translation.zh: 你一生挖土 赚那么一丁点钱 为的就是功劳？

translation.en: No, May. I do it 'cause I'm good at it.
translation.zh: 不 梅 我这么做 是因为我在这方面非常出色

translation.en: 'Cause that's what my father taught me, and what his father taught him.
translation.zh: 是因为这是我爷爷传授予我父亲 再由父亲传授于我的

translation.en: 'Cause you can show me a handful of soil from anywhere in Suffolk,
translation.zh: 是因为你在萨福克郡随手抓一把土壤

translation.en: and I can pretty much tell you whose land it's from.
translation.zh: 我都能告诉你那来自谁家的土地

translation.en: There you go.
translation.zh: 这就对了

translation.en: [Robert] Excuse me. Do you know Basil Brown?
translation.zh: 请问你认识巴兹尔布朗吗？

translation.en: -Do you know where he lives? -Yes, I know Basil.
translation.zh: -你知道他住哪吗？ -是 我认识巴兹尔

translation.en: He lives on a farm outside of the village. Carry on that way.
translation.zh: 他住在村外的农场里 往那边走

translation.en: Thank you so much.
translation.zh: 谢谢你

translation.en: I found that ship.
translation.zh: 那艘船是我找到的

translation.en: I may not be a fellow at Cambridge, but I worked out what was down there.
translation.zh: 我不是什么剑桥大学的研究员 但我琢磨出了底下埋着的是什么

translation.en: And Jacobs and Spooner, too, and nobody'll remember that.
translation.zh: 雅各布斯和斯普纳也有贡献 但没人会记得这一点

translation.en: You don't know that.
translation.zh: 那可不一定

translation.en: And if you're not around to see it to the end, there's even less chance.
translation.zh: 但你如果不坚持到底 那机会就更渺茫了

translation.en: You always told me your work isn't about the past or even the present.
translation.zh: 你总是告诉我 你的工作关乎的不是过去或现在

translation.en: It's for the future.
translation.zh: 而是未来

translation.en: So that the next generations can know where they came from.
translation.zh: 是为了让后世子孙 能够知道自己来自何处

translation.en: The line that joins them to their forebears. Isn't that what you always say?
translation.zh: 是将祖先和后代联系起来的纽带 你不总是这么说吗？

translation.en: Yeah, something like that.
translation.zh: 差不多

translation.en: [May] Why else would the lot of you be playing in the dirt
translation.zh: 否则的话 整个国家都在为战争做准备

translation.en: while the rest of the country prepares for war?
translation.zh: 你们怎么还会有闲情挖土呢？

translation.en: -Because that means something, innit? -[Brown sighs]
translation.zh: 因为那有着重大意义 对吧？

translation.en: Something that'll last longer than whatever damn war we're heading into.
translation.zh: 不同于眼前这场该死的战争 那份意义将永世长存

translation.en: Good hell.
translation.zh: 见鬼了

translation.en: That's Robert.
translation.zh: 那是罗伯特

translation.en: -Robert? -[Robert panting]
translation.zh: 罗伯特？

translation.en: -[bicycle brakes squeak] -Robert!
translation.zh: 罗伯特！

translation.en: [Robert] Mr. Brown!
translation.zh: 布朗先生

translation.en: [Brown] Robert, have you cycled all this way?
translation.zh: 罗伯特 你这样一路骑过来了吗？

translation.en: You promised.
translation.zh: 你答应过我的

translation.en: May! May!
translation.zh: 梅

translation.en: You said you'd show me the cosmos. You promised.
translation.zh: 你说过要让我看宇宙的 你答应过我的

translation.en: -Good heavens! Who have we here? -[Brown] This is Robert Pretty.
translation.zh: -天哪 这是谁呢？ -这是罗伯特普莱提

translation.en: [May] Robert, I'm Mrs. Brown.
translation.zh: 罗伯特 我是布朗太太

translation.en: I bet you have a rare thirst after that long ride, don't you?
translation.zh: 你骑了那么久的车 一定口渴了吧？

translation.en: -[Robert] Mm-hmm. -Come you here.
translation.zh: 你骑了那么久的车 一定口渴了吧？ 过来吧

translation.en: -Let's get you a cup of milk. -[Brown] That's a long way.
translation.zh: -那么大老远骑车过来 -进去喝杯牛奶

translation.en: Does your mother know you're here, Robert?
translation.zh: 你母亲知道你在这里吗？

translation.en: -[May] How'd you find your way? -She know you cycled?
translation.zh: -你怎么找到这里的？ -她知道你骑车过来吗？

translation.en: -[May] Should I take your bike for you? -[Robert] Yes, please.
translation.zh: -我来帮你扶着自行车吧 -给他弄点火腿 梅

translation.en: I better find a telephone, May. Call Mrs. Pretty.
translation.zh: 我得去给普莱提太太打个电话

translation.en: -[Pretty] Thank you. -[Brown] He's all right.
translation.zh: -谢谢你 -他没事 普莱提太太 他在屋里

translation.en: -He's inside. Uh, come this way. -[Pretty] Thank you.
translation.zh: -谢谢你 -他没事 普莱提太太 他在屋里 -跟我来 -谢谢你

translation.en: -We were obviously very worried. -Yes. He's… He's…
translation.zh: -我们显然急坏了 -是

translation.en: Uh, this is May, my wife.
translation.zh: 这是我妻子 梅

translation.en: -Mrs. Pretty. -Thank you very much.
translation.zh: -普莱提太太 -非常感谢你

translation.en: He's been no trouble. A lovely boy.
translation.zh: 他没给我们添麻烦 真是个好孩子

translation.en: Mrs. Brown has a music box from Whitby
translation.zh: 布朗太太有个来自惠特比的音乐盒

translation.en: covered in all manner of shells.
translation.zh: 上面缀满了各种各样的贝壳

translation.en: Would you like to see?
translation.zh: 你想看看吗？

translation.en: Uh, no. We've imposed on your kindness enough.
translation.zh: 不 我们给人家添的麻烦已经够多了

translation.en: What were you thinking?
translation.zh: 你当时在想什么呢？

translation.en: You could have been lost or killed.
translation.zh: 你可能会迷路或被杀死的

translation.en: -Robert… what were you thinking? -[Robert] I'm sorry, Mother.
translation.zh: 罗伯特 -你当时在想什么呢？ -母亲 对不起

translation.en: Uh, Robert came to remind me of a promise that I made.
translation.zh: 罗伯特是过来提醒我 我答应过他的一件事

translation.en: I said I'd show him the stars through my telescope.
translation.zh: 我说过要带他用望远镜看星星的

translation.en: Didn't I?
translation.zh: 对吧？

translation.en: Then you're returning?
translation.zh: 所以你会回来吗？

translation.en: I am. Yes.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: Thank you. [sighs]
translation.zh: 谢谢你

translation.en: [Rory] Morning!
translation.zh: 早安

translation.en: [Brown] Morning.
translation.zh: 早安

translation.en: Mr. Grimes. I've been, uh… taking notes.
translation.zh: 葛莱姆斯先生 我一直都有做笔记

translation.en: -Ah! -If they be of any use.
translation.zh: 也许你能用得上

translation.en: Why, they'd save me days.
translation.zh: 这会帮我省下好几天的时间

translation.en: -You must have suspected what was here. -[Brown] Well, you've made good progress.
translation.zh: -你一定早就料到这里埋着什么 -你的进展也不错

translation.en: [Grimes] As did you.
translation.zh: 彼此彼此

translation.en: Thank you kindly.
translation.zh: 多谢

translation.en: -[Grimes] It's fine work, Mr. Brown. -[Brown] Yeah. Well, we made a start.
translation.zh: 做得相当出色 布朗先生 也算是个开始吧

translation.en: -Phillips. -[Phillips] Our excavator has returned.
translation.zh: -菲利普斯 -我们的挖掘专家回来了

translation.en: [Brown] Morning.
translation.zh: 早安

translation.en: [Phillips] There's a sign in the bottom of the ship that there could be an intact chamber.
translation.zh: 有迹象表明 船底可能有一座完整的墓室

translation.en: [Piggott] Tremendously exciting.
translation.zh: 太令人兴奋了

translation.en: [Piggott] What about events in the wider world, C.W.?
translation.zh: 外面的世界正在发生的事呢 小查？

translation.en: How do you think it will affect us?
translation.zh: 你觉得会对我们有什么影响？

translation.en: [Phillips] Judging by last night's news…
translation.zh: 从昨晚的新闻来看

translation.en: I think we could be at war in a matter of weeks,
translation.zh: 我觉得战争可能会在几周内爆发

translation.en: and every excavation in the land will stop.
translation.zh: 而国内所有挖掘工程都会被迫停止

translation.en: -So, it's up to us. [clears throat] -[Piggott sighs]
translation.zh: 所以得看我们的了

translation.en: -Oh, good lord. [gasps] -Gosh.
translation.zh: -我的天哪 -天啊

translation.en: -[Piggott] Jim! Billy Grimes! -Stuart!
translation.zh: 吉姆！比利葛莱姆斯！ -斯图尔特！ -近来可好啊？

translation.en: -How the devil are you? -[Piggott chuckles] Very well.
translation.zh: -斯图尔特！ -近来可好啊？ 好极了 这是我妻子 玛格丽特

translation.en: -This is my wife, Margaret. -Peggy.
translation.zh: 好极了 这是我妻子 玛格丽特 -是佩吉 -幸会 皮戈特太太

translation.en: [Brailesford] Mrs. Piggott, a pleasure to meet you.
translation.zh: -是佩吉 -幸会 皮戈特太太

translation.en: [Peggy] Mr. Phillips, I-- um, I wanted to say how pleased I was
translation.zh: 菲利普斯先生 我只是想说 你特别指定要我过来 我感到万分荣幸

translation.en: that you specifically asked for me to come.
translation.zh: 你特别指定要我过来 我感到万分荣幸

translation.en: I know Stuart sent you my paper on Bosnian Lake villagers.
translation.zh: 我知道斯图尔特给你寄了 我写的波斯尼亚湖村民论文

translation.en: It was awfully good of you to read it.
translation.zh: 你肯赏脸过目真是太好了

translation.en: Ah, yes. Um, very stimulating.
translation.zh: 哦 对 非常引人入胜

translation.en: [Peggy chuckles] I hope I'll be able to repay your faith in me. [Phillips] I have no doubt.
translation.zh: -我希望我不会让你失望 -对此我毫不怀疑

translation.en: It's just that I haven't done much actual fieldwork yet.
translation.zh: 只是我并没参与过 很多实地的考古工作

translation.en: Uh, so I wouldn't want you to think I'm more experienced than I really am.
translation.zh: 所以我不想让你认为 我比实际上更有经验

translation.en: [Phillips] Ah, you have all the key attributes.
translation.zh: 你具备所有的关键条件

translation.en: [Peggy] Do I?
translation.zh: 真的吗？

translation.en: -This ship is very delicate. -[Peggy] Mm-hmm.
translation.zh: 这艘船非常脆弱

translation.en: One could say, it, um, scarcely exists at all.
translation.zh: 甚至可以说是几乎不存在

translation.en: Too much weight, it disintegrates.
translation.zh: 施加太多的重量 它会崩解

translation.en: You're probably less than nine stone, so I'll supervise from here
translation.zh: 你体重应该不到六十公斤 所以呢 你们这些身子轻盈的就负责挖掘 而我在这里监督就好

translation.en: while you light things get on with the digging.
translation.zh: 你们这些身子轻盈的就负责挖掘 而我在这里监督就好

translation.en: Am I to understand you only asked for me because of my size?
translation.zh: 所以你要求我过来 纯粹是因为我的体型吗？

translation.en: Uh, lucky guess, actually.
translation.zh: 还真被你猜中了

translation.en: [chuckles] Yeah, thank God Piggott didn't marry a piglet.
translation.zh: 没错 谢天谢地 皮戈特娶的不是个胖妞

translation.en: [Phillips] Carry on!
translation.zh: 继续吧

translation.en: -[Phillips] How does it look to you? -[Brailesford] Sir?
translation.zh: -布雷斯福德 -是 大人 你觉得怎么样？

translation.en: [Phillips] What have you got there?
translation.zh: 你这里有什么发现？

translation.en: [Brailesford] All right, then.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: -[Piggott] First round's on me, chaps! -[Phillips] Very nice of you.
translation.zh: -第一轮我请客 伙子们 -那就谢谢你了

translation.en: [coughs] Do they not have a… a double?
translation.zh: 他们没有双人床吗？

translation.en: [Piggott] Sorry, darling, no. This is fine, though, isn't it?
translation.zh: 没有 亲爱的 不过这也不错 对吧？

translation.en: We don't… We don't want to start by making a fuss.
translation.zh: 我们可不想一来就抱怨

translation.en: Oh, no. Of course not.
translation.zh: 不 当然不了

translation.en: We're so lucky to be part of this. [sighs]
translation.zh: 能参与这项工程 我们是何等幸运

translation.en: [Peggy] Yes.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: -[exhales] Yes, it's going to be amazing. -Mm.
translation.zh: 对 一定会超棒的

translation.en: Would you prefer this bed…
translation.zh: 你想要这张床

translation.en: or… or… or that one?
translation.zh: 还是那张床？

translation.en: I'll… I'll take this one, shall I?
translation.zh: 我就睡那张床吧

translation.en: [Brown] You need to find a star and identify its direction of travel.
translation.zh: 你必须找到一颗星星 并辨别其行进方向

translation.en: -Good evening, gentlemen. -[Brown] Good evening, Mrs. Pretty.
translation.zh: -晚上好 绅士们 -晚上好 普莱提太太

translation.en: -Hello, Mother. -[Pretty] Hello, darling.
translation.zh: 你好 母亲 你好 亲爱的

translation.en: [Robert] Do space pilots navigate using the stars?
translation.zh: 太空飞行员也利用星星导航吗？

translation.en: [Brown] Oh, most certainly, they do.
translation.zh: 这是当然的

translation.en: Ten more minutes, Commander. Then, bed.
translation.zh: 再给你十分钟 指挥官 然后去睡觉

translation.en: [Robert] I see a star.
translation.zh: 我看见星星了

translation.en: -Oh, God! -[Phillips] What's going on?
translation.zh: -天哪！ -发生什么事？

translation.en: -[Peggy] It just gave way. -[Phillips] Get her off there!
translation.zh: -别动 -突然塌下去了 快把她弄上来！

translation.en: -Piggott, get her off! -Oh, I'm so sorry!
translation.zh: 皮戈特 快把她弄上来！ 非常抱歉 我不是故意要破坏任何东西的

translation.en: -I didn't mean to damage anything. -[Piggott sighs] Oh, you…
translation.zh: 非常抱歉 我不是故意要破坏任何东西的

translation.en: -What you got, Brailesford? -[Brown] You all right?
translation.zh: -有什么发现 布雷斯福德？ -你没事吧？

translation.en: [Brailesford] Sort of rusted lumps.
translation.zh: 一堆生锈的东西

translation.en: [Phillips] Come on, man. Where's your training?
translation.zh: 天哪 你受过的训练呢？

translation.en: [Brailesford] Uh, an amorphous mass of corroded objects, sir.
translation.zh: 一堆已腐蚀的无定形块状物 大人

translation.en: You, get your camera down there. Photograph it.
translation.zh: 你 拿着相机下去把它拍下来

translation.en: That's… That's very hot in the full sun.
translation.zh: 这么大的太阳 你一定很热吧

translation.en: Oh, I'm fine. Thank you.
translation.zh: 我没事 谢谢你

translation.en: Watch your step there. This could well be our chamber.
translation.zh: 小心脚下 这很可能就是我们的墓室

translation.en: [Pretty] Some barley water, Mrs. Piggott?
translation.zh: 喝点大麦茶吧 皮戈特太太

translation.en: -[sighs] Thank you. So clumsy. -[Pretty] Oh, not at all.
translation.zh: -谢谢 我真是笨手笨脚 -不会 没这回事

translation.en: -That's a very lovely skirt. -[Peggy] Oh.
translation.zh: 你的裙子真漂亮

translation.en: [chuckles] Completely useless. I don't have anything more suitable.
translation.zh: 根本毫无用处 我没有更合适的衣服了

translation.en: -We came straight from our holiday. -Did you really?
translation.zh: -我们度完假直接过来的 -真的吗？

translation.en: -[Peggy chuckles] Yes. -[Pretty] Well, come to the house.
translation.zh: -真的 -过来我家吧

translation.en: Let's see what we can find.
translation.zh: 给你找些合适的衣服

translation.en: Is Mrs. Pretty still poorly?
translation.zh: 普莱提太太还生着病吗？

translation.en: She says she's perfectly fine, but…
translation.zh: 她说她完全没事 但…

translation.en: [whispering] …that's typical of her.
translation.zh: 那是她的典型作风

translation.en: Damn this weather.
translation.zh: 这该死的天气

translation.en: Losing a whole day.
translation.zh: 一整天就这样没了

translation.en: So little time before world events…
translation.zh: 战争很快就会爆发 让国家陷入混乱

translation.en: confound us.
translation.zh: 我们已时日无多

translation.en: [Phillips] It's a race, an absolute race.
translation.zh: 这绝对是一场和时间的赛跑

translation.en: [Pretty] Then you are wasting the talents of Mr. Brown.
translation.zh: 那你就是在浪费布朗先生的才华

translation.en: Well, that's an excellent idea.
translation.zh: 那是个非常好的主意

translation.en: Stuart couldn't fault his work. Could he not be unearthing the stern?
translation.zh: 斯图尔特对他的工作无可挑剔 就不能让他挖掘船尾吗？

translation.en: [Phillips] Mr. Brown isn't qualified.
translation.zh: 布朗先生不够格

translation.en: Well, that's just snobbery, isn't it, Mr. Phillips?
translation.zh: 你这只是势利眼吧 菲利普斯先生？

translation.en: -[Phillips] Brown! -[Peggy clears throat]
translation.zh: 布朗！

translation.en: [Phillips] Brown!
translation.zh: 布朗！

translation.en: Brown, come here, man!
translation.zh: 布朗 过来！

translation.en: [Piggott gasps] Oh my God, Margaret.
translation.zh: 我的天哪 玛格丽特！

translation.en: Sorry. I forgot to lock the door.
translation.zh: 抱歉 我忘了锁门

translation.en: [chuckles] No, you see, we… we… we share that bathroom
translation.zh: 你必须明白 我们和其他四间房共用一个浴室

translation.en: with… with four other rooms, and, you know, I could have been anyone.
translation.zh: 你必须明白 我们和其他四间房共用一个浴室 刚才开门的可以是任何人

translation.en: -Um, I could've been Grimes or Phillips. -[Peggy scoffs]
translation.zh: 可以是葛莱姆斯 或者菲利普斯

translation.en: But you're not. You're my husband.
translation.zh: 但开门的是你 我的丈夫

translation.en: [chuckles] Yes, but how… how do you think I'd feel if… if one of them saw you in that state?
translation.zh: 是 但如果被他们看到你那副样子 你觉得我会有何感受？

translation.en: [scoffs] Oh! In what state?
translation.zh: 什么样子？

translation.en: [giggles] In this state?
translation.zh: 这副样子吗？

translation.en: Christ, I-- Stop. You should be more careful. It's…
translation.zh: 天哪 别闹了 你应该更小心点才是

translation.en: You know, now, after… after waiting eons, I shall… I shall go and have my bath.
translation.zh: 等了那么久 我现在终于可以去洗个澡了

translation.en: -[Grimes] Mr. Spooner. -[Spooner] Right.
translation.zh: -斯普纳先生 -是

translation.en: -Morning, Mr. Piggott. -[chuckles nervously] C.W.
translation.zh: -早安啊 皮戈特先生 -早 小查

translation.en: -[whispers] You might have woken me. -I didn't like to.
translation.zh: 你应该叫醒我的 我不想吵醒你

translation.en: You made me appear late.
translation.zh: 你让我迟到了

translation.en: [Piggott whispering] Careful, Stuart. You've got a delicate line now, man.
translation.zh: 小心点 斯图尔特 那是很脆弱的缆索

translation.en: -Yeah. -[Phillips] Just a moment.
translation.zh: -准备好了吗？ -稍等

translation.en: You have to be very careful now. No cavalier lifting.
translation.zh: 要小心翼翼 不准马虎

translation.en: -[Phillips] Very gently. -Yes, sir.
translation.zh: -轻轻地 -是 大人

translation.en: [Phillips] On my count. One, two, three.
translation.zh: 听我口令 一 二 三

translation.en: [softly] And we do it this way.
translation.zh: 慢慢抬上来

translation.en: [Rory] Don't move.
translation.zh: 别动

translation.en: -[Peggy breathing shakily] -[Brailesford] Piggott, look.
translation.zh: 皮戈特 你看

translation.en: [Piggott] Where did you find it, darling? You clever girl.
translation.zh: 亲爱的 你在哪找到的？ 你这聪明的姑娘

translation.en: Phillips!
translation.zh: 菲利普斯

translation.en: -Look at this, sir. -Look. Look!
translation.zh: -看看这个 大人 -你看 你们看

translation.en: -[Phillips] Ah, good Lord. -[Piggott] His face!
translation.zh: -天啊 -看他这表情

translation.en: Phillips.
translation.zh: 菲利普斯

translation.en: -Mrs. Pretty, there's more. -[Brown] And here. And here too.
translation.zh: -普莱提太太 -这里也有 还有更多

translation.en: [Peggy] There's much more.
translation.zh: 还有更多呢

translation.en: [Brown] Could you both, uh, cast your eyes on this, please?
translation.zh: 能请二位看一下这个吗？

translation.en: I, uh, found it down between the strikes.
translation.zh: 我在列板之间找到的

translation.en: I believe that's a Merovingian tremissis.
translation.zh: 我相信这是一枚梅罗文加王朝的金币

translation.en: -Late 6th century. -[Phillips scoffs] Can't be.
translation.zh: 来自公元六世纪晚期 不可能

translation.en: Viking East Anglia didn't have a coin-based economy till the 9th century.
translation.zh: 东盎格利亚的维京人 在公元九世纪才开始使用货币

translation.en: [Brown] Well, I think that the ship is older.
translation.zh: 我认为这艘船还要更古老些

translation.en: Mr. Brown has always said so.
translation.zh: 布朗先生一直都这么认为

translation.en: This is Anglo-Saxon.
translation.zh: 这来自盎格鲁-撒克逊时期

translation.en: Piggott! Grimes!
translation.zh: 皮戈特！葛莱姆斯！

translation.en: It's Dark Age, by Jupiter!
translation.zh: 这艘船来自黑暗时代 我的老天！

translation.en: Sixth century!
translation.zh: 公元六世纪

translation.en: This changes everything.
translation.zh: 这改变了一切

translation.en: These people were not just marauding barterers.
translation.zh: 这些人不仅仅是喜欢四处劫掠 只懂得物物交换的野蛮人

translation.en: They had culture!
translation.zh: 他们有文化

translation.en: They had art!
translation.zh: 他们有艺术

translation.en: They had money!
translation.zh: 他们有金钱！

translation.en: [Grimes] Well, Vikings are out the window.
translation.zh: 维京人是没戏了

translation.en: -C.W., look. -[Peggy] God's sake.
translation.zh: -小查 你看 -天哪

translation.en: Oh, good God.
translation.zh: 我的天

translation.en: [Phillips] Brown has just shown me a Merovingian tremissis.
translation.zh: 布朗刚刚给我看了 一枚梅罗文加王朝的金币

translation.en: -[crew laughs] -That's Anglo-Saxon.
translation.zh: 那来自盎格鲁-撒克逊时期

translation.en: [Phillips] It's incredible!
translation.zh: 真是太不可思议了

translation.en: [Peggy] Hello. Are you camping out here?
translation.zh: 你好 你在这里露营吗？

translation.en: [Robert] No. That's where my cousin Rory sleeps.
translation.zh: 不 这是我表舅罗伊睡的地方

translation.en: [Peggy] Is he not allowed indoors?
translation.zh: 他不被允许进屋吗？

translation.en: [Robert] No, he… he thinks the house is too hot.
translation.zh: 不是 他觉得屋里太闷热了

translation.en: -[Peggy chuckles] I can imagine. -[Robert] He's going to join the RAF.
translation.zh: 我能想象 他即将加入皇家空军

translation.en: -Is he? -They're sending his papers any day.
translation.zh: -是吗？ -他们随时都会寄通知书过来

translation.en: He's going to get his wings.
translation.zh: 他很快就会获得飞行资格了

translation.en: Well done, everybody, on a splendid effort.
translation.zh: 干得非常漂亮 大家

translation.en: Brailesford, Piggott,
translation.zh: 布雷斯福德 皮戈特

translation.en: if you'll start loading the gold into the car,
translation.zh: 可以开始把金子装上车了

translation.en: we'll get it straight to the British Museum.
translation.zh: 我们直接送到大英博物馆去

translation.en: [Pretty] I beg your pardon?
translation.zh: 你说什么？

translation.en: Well, it's the obvious place for it, Mrs. Pretty.
translation.zh: 送去那里是理所当然的 普莱提太太

translation.en: [Pretty] London is preparing for air raids.
translation.zh: 伦敦正在为空袭做准备

translation.en: The British Museum is currently being emptied of its treasures, isn't it?
translation.zh: 大英博物馆的珍宝目前正在被清空 不是吗？

translation.en: [Phillips] Uh, yes, but, um, it… it'll go to the lab.
translation.zh: 是 但… 我们会把它送去实验室

translation.en: [Pretty] This treasure came from someone's grave.
translation.zh: 这些珍宝来自某人的坟墓

translation.en: There'll be an inquest, as you know, and its fate will be decided there.
translation.zh: 如你所知 必将进行勘验 而其命运将在到时候见分晓

translation.en: Until then, Mr. Brown…
translation.zh: 在那之前 布朗先生

translation.en: as the finder of this magnificent ship, would you please take the treasure up to the house?
translation.zh: 作为这艘宏伟的船的发现者 麻烦你将珍宝都带进屋里去

translation.en: Uh, yes, Mrs. Pretty.
translation.zh: 是 普莱提太太

translation.en: Thank you all very much.
translation.zh: 非常感谢大家

translation.en: [Brown] Right, uh, gentlemen, I'll need some assistance. Mr. Lomax?
translation.zh: 好 绅士们 我需要些帮助 洛马克斯先生

translation.en: [Phillips] This is most irregular.
translation.zh: 这太不合规矩了

translation.en: [Grimes] It all belongs to Mrs. Pretty, doesn't it?
translation.zh: 一切都属于普莱提太太 对吧？

translation.en: It's found on her land.
translation.zh: 是在她的土地上发现的

translation.en: [Piggott] Well, surely, the inquest will decide
translation.zh: 我想勘验结果会决定

translation.en: whether the treasure belongs to Mrs. Pretty or the Crown.
translation.zh: 珍宝到底属于普莱提太太还是皇室

translation.en: [Phillips] Piggott, do you want this treasure to go to the Ipswich Museum?
translation.zh: 皮戈特 你希望珍宝 归属于伊普斯威奇博物馆吗？

translation.en: [Pretty] Am I doing the right thing?
translation.zh: 我这么做是对的吗？

translation.en: It's someone's grave.
translation.zh: 那是某人的坟墓

translation.en: [Brown] No, that's… that's life what's revealed.
translation.zh: 不 那是生命的足迹

translation.en: And that's why we dig.
translation.zh: 而我们正是为此而挖掘

translation.en: [Pretty] Just in here. I think that's best.
translation.zh: 就这里 我觉得放这里最好了

translation.en: They're like emissaries from another world.
translation.zh: 它们就像是来自另一个世界的使者

translation.en: [Rory] I used to camp with Robert's father, you see.
translation.zh: 我以前经常和罗伯特的父亲一起露营

translation.en: [Rory] I remember him telling me the calls of all the birds.
translation.zh: 我记得他教过我 如何识别各种鸟儿的叫声

translation.en: Now, whenever I hear nightingales, I think of these woods.
translation.zh: 现在 每当听到夜莺的叫声 我都会想起这片树林

translation.en: -[Peggy] Are there nightingales? -Haven't you heard them?
translation.zh: -这里有夜莺吗？ -你没听到它们的叫声吗？

translation.en: [Peggy] No.
translation.zh: 没有

translation.en: Never heard a nightingale at all. Only on the wireless.
translation.zh: 我没真正听过夜莺的叫声 只在收音机上听说过

translation.en: There's a wonderful cellist called Beatrice Harrison.
translation.zh: 有一位很棒的大提琴家 名叫碧翠斯哈里森

translation.en: In the summer evenings, she used to practice in the garden, and…
translation.zh: 每当夏夜 她都会在花园里练琴

translation.en: one night, she was playing a scale, and a… a nightingale joined in.
translation.zh: 有天晚上 她正在练习音阶时 一只夜莺加入进来了

translation.en: At first, she couldn't believe it. She started playing a sonata,
translation.zh: 她起初还不敢相信 所以便开始演奏一首奏鸣曲 而夜莺也配合她唱了起来

translation.en: and the nightingale accompanied her.
translation.zh: 所以便开始演奏一首奏鸣曲 而夜莺也配合她唱了起来

translation.en: -[Rory] Really? -[Peggy] Mm-hmm. Yes.
translation.zh: 真的？

translation.en: [chuckles] Yes. It happened again the next night and next night.
translation.zh: 是啊 接下来的两个晚上 同样的事又发生了

translation.en: Miss Harrison was so excited about it, she went to the BBC and told them all about it.
translation.zh: 哈里森女士兴奋不已 并将这件事告诉了英国广播公司

translation.en: [Rory] And? [Peggy] So, a few evenings later,
translation.zh: -然后呢？ -所以几天后

translation.en: the BBC came and put their recording equipment in Miss Harrison's garden.
translation.zh: 英国广播公司在哈里森女士的花园里 安装了录音设备

translation.en: She started to play, and they waited and, um, waited…
translation.zh: 她开始演奏 他们等了又等

translation.en: and…
translation.zh: 最后…

translation.en: and at last, the nightingale began to sing.
translation.zh: 夜莺终于唱了起来

translation.en: Went on for about 15 minutes…
translation.zh: 持续了大约15分钟

translation.en: rising and falling with the cello.
translation.zh: 歌声随着大提琴声跌宕起伏

translation.en: -No. -[both laughing]
translation.zh: 不可能

translation.en: -Yes. -Wow.
translation.zh: 真的

translation.en: I know. Hmm.
translation.zh: 很厉害吧？

translation.en: But… the really extraordinary thing is that…
translation.zh: 不过 真正不可思议的是

translation.en: other people who'd been listening to the broadcast in their gardens
translation.zh: 其他在花园里收听广播的人

translation.en: reported that other nightingales also started to sing.
translation.zh: 说其他夜莺也开始唱起了歌来

translation.en: Well, that's wonderful.
translation.zh: 那太美妙了

translation.en: Yes, it was. It was wonderful.
translation.zh: 确实 确实很美妙

translation.en: [Piggott] Margaret!
translation.zh: 玛格丽特！

translation.en: -Come on! -[Peggy sighs] All right. Hmm.
translation.zh: -走吧 -来了

translation.en: Well… good night.
translation.zh: 好吧 晚安

translation.en: I shall listen out for cellos in the woods.
translation.zh: 我会留心听树林里的大提琴声的

translation.en: "Cellos." [mumbles]
translation.zh: 大提琴

translation.en: -[Brailesford] Here we are, chaps. -[Phillips] All right.
translation.zh: 啤酒来了

translation.en: [Brailesford] Well, we are unburying a legend.
translation.zh: 一代传奇即将重见天日

translation.en: -Beowulf. -Arthur, King of the Britons.
translation.zh: -《贝奥武夫》 -不列颠之王亚瑟

translation.en: Cheers.
translation.zh: 干杯

translation.en: Talk about Dark Ages. I can hardly see my pint.
translation.zh: 说到黑暗时代 我都看不见我的啤酒了

translation.en: What actually is that?
translation.zh: 这到底是怎么回事？

translation.en: [Piggott] It's the, uh, trial blackouts, C.W.
translation.zh: 是灯火管制演习 小查

translation.en: So Germans will be coming by air this time, will they?
translation.zh: 所以德军这次要坐飞机过来吗？

translation.en: Last time, they came by the river.
translation.zh: 上次是顺着河流过来的

translation.en: In AD 600.
translation.zh: 你说公元六百年啊？

translation.en: You know, I'm… It's been a big day. I'm quite done in.
translation.zh: 那个… 今天忙了一整天 我也累坏了

translation.en: Um, will you all excuse me?
translation.zh: 今天忙了一整天 我也累坏了 我先失陪了

translation.en: -Aw. -Well done, Mrs. P, on a marvelous find.
translation.zh: 干得漂亮 皮戈特太太

translation.en: [Brailesford] Yes. Cheers to your clever wife!
translation.zh: 没错 敬你聪明的妻子

translation.en: -Yeah. No, I'll come with you, darling. -No.
translation.zh: -我陪你吧 亲爱的 -不

translation.en: No, no. Um, surely you want to celebrate.
translation.zh: 不用了 你留下来庆祝吧

translation.en: -Stay for another, Piggott. -My round. Set them up again, would you?
translation.zh: 留下再喝一杯吧 皮戈特 这轮我请客 再上一轮啤酒 谢谢

translation.en: I say, C.W., ask him if he'll take a Merovingian tremissis.
translation.zh: 我说 小查 问他接不接受梅罗文加王朝的金币

translation.en: [radio announcer] …the press campaign,
translation.zh: …新闻宣传活动

translation.en: the menacing statements of the statesmen leading the policy of Germany,
translation.zh: 负责执行德国政策的政治家 所发表的威胁性言论

translation.en: the systematic provocation of frontier incidents,
translation.zh: 有系统性的边界挑衅

translation.en: and finally, the constantly increasing concentrations of mobilized armed forces
translation.zh: 以及波兰边境上 数量不断增加的武装部队

translation.en: at the Polish frontiers constitute an obvious proof of this.
translation.zh: 以及波兰边境上 数量不断增加的武装部队 促成了此项明显之举：

translation.en: A Labour deputation called on the Prime Minister last night,
translation.zh: 劳工代表团昨晚呼吁首相

translation.en: requesting the immediate evacuation of women, children, and cripples
translation.zh: 立即撤离所有妇女、儿童和残疾人

translation.en: as precaution against the sudden outbreak of war.
translation.zh: 以防战争突然爆发

translation.en: [man 1 in film] He'll find Buck Rogers if anybody can.
translation.zh: …那谁都能找到巴克罗杰斯

translation.en: [man 2 in film] Get the guards, you fools!
translation.zh: 快找守卫 你们这帮蠢蛋！ 如果他们成功逃走的话 我就让你们都加入机器人部队！

translation.en: If they get away, I'll put every man of you in the robot battalion!
translation.zh: 如果他们成功逃走的话 我就让你们都加入机器人部队！

translation.en: [whispering] Not yet.
translation.zh: 还不是时候

translation.en: Not yet. [sniffles]
translation.zh: 还不是时候

translation.en: Darling, C.W. wants me to take some of the corroded iron to the lab.
translation.zh: 亲爱的 小查让我把一些锈铁送到实验室去

translation.en: Uh, we think it might be fragmented armor,
translation.zh: 我们觉得那可能是碎裂的铠甲

translation.en: and I… I badly want to start cleaning it up. So…
translation.zh: 而我非常想开始对其进行清理 所以…

translation.en: Am I to come with you?
translation.zh: 要我跟你一起去吗？

translation.en: No, because C.W. needs all the hands he can get here, so, uh…
translation.zh: 不 因为小查这里 需要尽可能多的人手 而且他对你的表现非常满意

translation.en: And he's very pleased with you.
translation.zh: 而且他对你的表现非常满意

translation.en: -Is he? -[Piggott] Mm.
translation.zh: 是么？

translation.en: Uh, so I'm taking Brailesford because the lab's really his thing.
translation.zh: 但我会带上布雷斯福德 因为实验室的事是他的专长

translation.en: You're going to have to be a brick about it, Margaret. [Peggy] Peggy.
translation.zh: -你得通情达理点 玛格丽特 -佩吉

translation.en: My name's Peggy.
translation.zh: 我的名字是佩吉

translation.en: I'll… I'll… I'll miss you very much, Peggy.
